name: Mad Run
description:
Mad Run is a prototype of idle / RPG game created with my custom game engine based on SDL2 and some free graphic assets found on itch.io, credits will be added soon.

Combats are PvE, 1v1 and for now, auto and turn based.
There is an infinite number of stages, 17 unique backgrounds, 200 unique enemies ( way more are on the way ) and 79 unique bosses.
Player gain money that are used to improve the hero's attack and defense.
Each time the hero kill an enemies, he/she gain xp and can level up. Each level up increase hp and heal the hero.
There is no item or bonus to get yet, but it's planned.

Keep in mind, it's an early prototype and a lot of work is need in terms of gameplay.

I've used the following graphic assets ( thank you for creating them ) : 
- ARZ-Game-Kit.zip ( https://mobilegamegraphics.itch.io/ )
- Aekashics Librarium Static Battlers.zip  ( https://aekashics.itch.io/ )
- IconPack1000.zip ( https://koros.itch.io/ )

Part of the UI is my ( poor ) work.
